Package org.parboiled.support

Interface Summary
DoWithMatcherVisitor.Action  
InputBuffer Abstraction of a simple char[] buffer holding the input text to be parsed.
MatcherVisitor<R> The interface to be implemented by all visitors of Matchers.
ValueStack<V> A ValueStack is a stack implementation for parser values.
 

Class Summary
CanMatchEmptyVisitor A MatcherVisitor determining whether a matcher can legally succeed with an empty match.
Characters An immutable, set-like aggregation of (relatively few) characters that allows for an inverted semantic ("all chars except these few").
Checks Utility methods for grammar integrity checks.
DebuggingValueStack<V>  
DefaultInputBuffer Immutable default implementation of an InputBuffer.
DefaultMatcherVisitor<R> A basic MatcherVisitor implementation that delegates all visiting methods to one default value method.
DefaultValueStack<V> An implementation of a stack of value objects providing an efficient snapshot capability and a number of convenience methods.
DefaultValueStack.Element  
DoWithMatcherVisitor A MatcherVisitor that executes a given DoWithMatcherVisitor.Action against a whole matcher hierarchy in a depth-first manner.
FollowMatchersVisitor Collects the matchers that can legally follow the currently running matcher according to the grammar into a given list.
GetAStarterCharVisitor Returns the first character a given matcher can start a match with.
HasCustomLabelVisitor A simple matcher visitor determining whether a matcher has a custom label.
InputBuffer.Position Simple container class for a line/column position in the input text.
IsSingleCharMatcherVisitor A MatcherVisitor determining whether a matcher is a basic single character matcher.
IsStarterCharVisitor A MatcherVisitor determining whether a matcher can start a match with a given char.
LabelPrefixPredicate<V> A simple Node predicate determining whether a Node matches a given label prefix.
MatcherPath Holds a snapshot of the current Matcher stack at a certain point during the parsing process.
MutableInputBuffer An InputBuffer wrapping another InputBuffer and providing for the ability to insert (and undo) characters at certain index positions.
NodeFormatter<V> A simple Formatter that provides String representation for parse tree nodes.
ParseTreeUtils General utility methods for operating on parse trees.
ParsingResult<V> A simple container encapsulating the result of a parsing run.
StringVar Simple specialization of a Var for Strings.
ToStringFormatter<T> A simple Formatter falling back to the objects toString() method.
Var<T> This class provides a "local variable"-like construct for action expressions in parser rule methods.
